attributes.action: allow the hunting of caravan owners with hounds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nobody likes people who own caravans. unlike foxes so why not allow the hunting of caravan owners with Hounds?
 They clog up the roads and really annoy everybody it would be a mercy to give them a swift death.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
